description:
Kashue makes a surprising deal with Ashram, and the fight with Shooting Star begins! Who will take the scepter?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le sceptre de la domination... Le rêve d’unifier Lodoss
Shihai no Oushaku... Lodoss Touitsu no Yume
The Scepter of Domination... The Dream of a United Lodoss
支配の王錫... ロードス統一の夢
